meanings.sent1: The surgery was painless, and I felt no discomfort at all.
meanings.sent2: She found the painless massage very relaxing.
meanings.sent3: The painless dentist visit was a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent4: His explanation was so clear, it made the difficult topic seem painless.
meanings.sent5: The painless process made it easy for everyone to participate.

meanings.definition: Done without causing pain or discomfort.
meanings.sent1: The injection was painless, and I barely felt a thing.
meanings.sent2: The artist used a painless technique to create the beautiful painting.
meanings.sent3: The painless prank left everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a painless breeze on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The painless solution saved us a lot of trouble.
